Amsterdam, Netherlands (ONSITE, VISA) - Developers / Designers | Full Time | https://florinapp.com

Florin is building the IFTTT for payments, and we're currently looking to expand our team with developers and designers. We're using Smart Contracts to create If This Then That or Conditional Payments for B2C and B2B use-cases. We're currently in private beta with around 250 users.

If you're interested in building things with Ethereum and connecting it to the existing banking system, please get in touch at andre@florinapp.com.
